articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.title: ESA, Airbus, and Voyager Space ink deal for Starlab space station - BroadcastProME.com
articles.description: Photo Credit: Voyager Space The European Space Agency (ESA), Airbus Defence and Space, and Voyager Space
articles.content:
The two companies and ESA will initially study how the planned Starlab space station can be used to provide continued access to space for Europe after the retirement of the ISS.
Photo Credit: Voyage… [+3390 chars]
